mapper.sql: id, name, sex, birthday, openid, state, userid
mapper.select:
select
from sys_baby_baseInfo where openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1

select
from sys_baby_baseInfo where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY createTime DESC

select
from sys_baby_baseInfo where openid = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY createTime DESC
select sbi.* from sys_baby_baseInfo sbi left join sys_user su on sbi.userid = su.id where su.openid = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_baby_baseInfo (id, name, sex, birthday, openid, state, userid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
